title: SpeedyVista V5
description:
************************************************** *****************************
SpeedyVista V5
************************************************** *****************************

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Windows Vista Ultimate SP1 Operating System
Compression Format...: RAR
Image Format.........: .ISO
Burn Tested..........: Yes
Special DVD..........: Requires DVD Disc


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
SpeedyVista Is back with V5. Rebuilt from scratch, with even more tweaks.
It Now contains Vista SP1...



What Is SpeedyVista?

Ok, for all of you that don&#039;t know what it is, SpeedyVista is a modified version 
of Windows Vista 32 Bit Ultimate SP1. Its had vigarous tweaks, and many components removed (See Below!) to produce the best and fastest version of Vista Yet!

What&#039;s Gone?

The following has been removed 

Accessibility
Mobility Center
Snipping Tool
Speech Support
System Information
Welcome Center
Wordpad

Information


Its Fully Activated + Genuine! Thanks to Vista Bootloader 2.1.3, you can recieve 
all Microsoft Updates! and other Genuine Goodies! The Bootloader no longer shows the text during system startup.

All Updates Till June 25th 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Burn ISO to DVD
2. Pop DVD in, Boot From Disc ONLY!!!
3. Specify Partition
4. Leave To Install (Only 6GB!)
5. Enter User Details.
6. Let The CMD prompts Do Their Work!
7. Its Ready When SpeedyVista Wallpaper Has Been Applied
